anagram
=======

|PyPI| |Wercker| |GitHub license| |PyPI|

I'm a small script that help you get anagram use wordsmith.org.

Install
-------

..  code:: bash

    sudo pip install anagram

Usage
-----

use a single word
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

..  code:: bash

    $ anagram cat
    1. act
    2. cat

use a sentence
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

..  code:: bash

    $  anagram a dog
    1. goad
    2. a god
    3. a dog
    4. ad go

Changelog
---------

- v0.0.3

  - first version, with base function.
